properties.entry: SELECT PR.PRODUCT_NO, PR.CLASS_NAME, PR.PRICE, PR.LOCATION, PI.CLASS_CATEGORY, PI.CLASS_KEYWORD, PF.FILE_SAVE_PATH, PF.FILE_NAME, PF.FILE_LEVEL FROM PRODUCT PR JOIN PRODUCT_INFO PI ON PI.PRODUCT_NO = PR.PRODUCT_NO JOIN PRODUCT_FILE PF ON PR.PRODUCT_NO = PF.REF_NO WHERE LOCATION LIKE ?
SELECT CLASS_KEYWORD, USER_ID FROM USER_KEYWORD WHERE USER_ID = ?

SELECT P.PRODUCT_NO, P.CLASS_NAME, P.PRICE, UK.USER_ID, UK.CLASS_KEYWORD, PF.FILE_SAVE_PATH, PF.FILE_NAME, PF.FILE_LEVEL, PI.CLASS_CATEGORY FROM USER_KEYWORD UK JOIN PRODUCT_INFO PI ON UK.CLASS_KEYWORD = PI.CLASS_KEYWORD JOIN PRODUCT P ON PI.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO JOIN PRODUCT_FILE PF ON P.PRODUCT_NO = PF.REF_NO WHERE UK.USER_ID = ?

SELECT PR.PRODUCT_NO, PR.CLASS_NAME, PR.PRICE, PR.LOCATION, PI.CLASS_CATEGORY, PI.CLASS_KEYWORD, PF.FILE_SAVE_PATH, PF.FILE_NAME, PF.FILE_LEVEL FROM PRODUCT PR JOIN PRODUCT_INFO PI ON PI.PRODUCT_NO = PR.PRODUCT_NO JOIN PRODUCT_FILE PF ON PR.PRODUCT_NO = PF.REF_NO WHERE CLASS_CATEGORY LIKE ?
